translations: 扳道员；能干的组织者；转辙员；手腕好的人

sentences.sentence: It puts forward the concrete plan of monitoring the shunters in the respects of way of design, standards to follow and monitoring mode. The paper also illustrates the difficult problems to be solved.
sentences.translation: 阐述了利用机车监控装置为调车作业实施监控的可行性，从基本思路、遵循的标准和监控模式等方面提出了调车监控的具体方案及解决的难点问题。
